Welcome to the vintage-inspired Czech/English word game

You can play randomly or you can create an account and enjoy a leveling system that gives you a title based on your words knowledge, compete with the top 10 players in the game and never have to solve the same word twice.

- Your username must be 6-12 characters long and it can only consist of alphanumeric characters

- Your password must be 8-20 characters long
